Title: 41962 - # Surprising Ways to Improve Your Sex Life
Direction: 675 words. When you've been in a relationship for a while, sometimes your sex life can suffer. We've all heard solutions like experimenting in the bedroom and making more time for one another, but what do you do when these fail? This article should offer 4-8 more unusual and surprising tips for improving your sex life. You can incorporate the client link by stating that you can ingest more zinc to improve your sex life. You can mention this is available in many foods, but you can get a more concentrated amount from the zinc mineral sticks sold through Amway. Your target audience is interested in information about love, sex, and relationships.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: purchasing zinc mineral sticks through Amway

Title: 41963 - The # Female Beauty Products Men Should Use Too
Direction: 675 words. For a long time men steered clear of beauty products, believing they were solely a female's domain. However, neglecting them has caused men's skin to suffer. Highlight 4-8 of the beauty products usually associated with women, which men can benefit from using as well. You could perhaps use the client link by stating the Amway Connections blog explains how women can use powder foundations to contour and highlight their skin, but men can use them more subtly to even out problem skin.
